events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn’t fit and I would like to request a refund for this order.
The customer's request has been categorized under Refund based on their message about returning the jacket due to sizing issues.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket returned due to size mismatch.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket that didn’t fit.
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the jacket has been returned or if you need assistance with the return process?
The order number is 987654321. I have packed the jacket but haven't shipped it back yet because I was unsure about the return steps.
We will provide you with a prepaid return label via email today and once we receive the jacket, we will initiate your refund promptly.
Thank you for the quick response and assistance. I appreciate the prepaid label and will send the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with regarding your order.
Since your refund was successfully delivered and no further queries were raised, we are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us.
